title: Please help ID this calligraphy font!
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015164035im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_6365.jpg)

Can someone help me identify this font and if you know where to download it, that would be great too!!

author: adl1313

comments.content: Spmething by Emily Conners (Emily Lime) at MyFonts.
